_sText:
Based on surf_japan

a few things to know:
the caste/fort is the bombsite
the crates at the bottom of spawn is where the buyzone is
all the stairs have an invisible ramp so you can slide up them

a roundtime between 2-3 is ideal

enjoy!


a short video surfing around the map
<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/YpBqi_wEY6E&hl=en&fs=1"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/YpBqi_wEY6E&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="280" height="235"></object>

credits:
monkeydie(author of surf japan) - this is afterall based on his idea
ptad(me) - making 100% of this map

all criticism welcome except anything about needing a jail
